entry.title: $2695 // 2 BED. NO FEE. GREAT LOCATION. PRIVATE BACK YARD.

For any viewing and information Please call / text / email at Zoey show contact info

entry.title: $2250 // Beautiful apartment ♦♦ in a pre-war ♦ elevator building
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath in Crown Heights, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Franklin Av, Botanic Garden. Beautiful apartment in a pre-war elevator building. The unit features stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, exposed brick, large windows, large living room, and much more. Steps away from the S/2/3/4/5 train line, trendy Franklin Avenue shops, restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Just a few blocks from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Grand Army Plaza library, Prospect Park YMCA and much more. Must See!
Amenities

Hardwood Floors
Elevator
Laundry in building
Exposed Brick
High Ceilings
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stone countertops

TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-8-Eight and mention this ad,
